articles.title: Microsoft Announces IntelliCode at Build 2018
articles.content: Microsoft introduces IntelliCode at Build 2018 conference, pioneering AI-assisted development with intelligent code completions based on machine learning models trained on thousands of open-source projects.
articles.summary: Microsoft introduces IntelliCode at Build 2018 conference, pioneering AI-assisted development with intelligent code completions based on machine learning models trained on thousands of open-source pro...
